content: @Ewout Kramer , do we know when Simplifier will be able to host/render R4 profiles?
We are working on it right now. @Martijn Harthoorn : can you give an estimate when it will be released?
We are planning to get R4 in Simplifier by the end of January. There are quite some sub systems that need to be updated for that. Some parts will be ready later.

Thanks @Martijn Harthoorn @Marco Visser

Forge for FHIR R4 requires quite a bit of re-work, to handle breaking changes in behavior, especially constraints on element types and choice types. These changes require re-design of some aspects of the UI. We aim to publish a stable Forge R4 release before the next WGM in May 2019.
okay thanks @Michel Rutten . Really looking forward to get hands on ;-)
